ingredient.1.name: 7-Up
ingredient.1.description: Refresco carbonatado de limón y lima. Perfil cítrico dulce con acidez brillante y burbujas ligeras. Graduación alcohólica habitual: 0%. Se utiliza para lengthen cóctels y add dulzor y fizz in highballs like **Whisky Highball** variations o **vodka 7-Up**.
ingredient.2.name: Absenta
ingredient.2.description: Absenta is an anise-forward spirit distilled con wormwood y other botanicals, typically 45-74% % vol. It is traditionally diluted con agua to unlock its louche haze. Nicknamed the verde fairy y linked to 19th-Century artists.
ingredient.3.name: Absolut Citron
ingredient.3.description: Citrus-flavored **vodka** from Absolut in Åhus, Sweden, about 40% % vol. a bright limón character elevates **Cosmopolitans** y other citrus cocktails.
ingredient.4.name: Absolut Vodka
ingredient.4.description: Swedish winter wheat **vodka** from Åhus con about 40% % vol. Known para a clean, neutral profile y consistent quality. Popular base para countless cocktails worldwide.
ingredient.5.name: Acqua Bianca
ingredient.5.description: Acqua Bianca licor is a clear, vanilla-citrus huevo licor style spirit con creamy dulzor y around 20% % vol.
ingredient.6.name: Agave Jarabe
ingredient.6.description: Agave jarabe is a honey-like sweetener made from blue agave y related plants. It has a mellow caramel dulzor y dissolves quickly in cold cóctels. Common in **Margaritas** y other **tequila** cocktails.
ingredient.7.name: Añejo Ron
ingredient.7.description: Ron añejo in oak para deeper caramel y spice notes, typically around 40% % vol. Made from molasses o sugarcane zumo. Smooth sipper that also suits **Old Fashioned**-style cóctels.
ingredient.8.name: Ale
ingredient.8.description: Ale is a malty, fruity cerveza around 4-6% % vol. Enjoy it in a Shandy o Snakebite.
ingredient.9.name: Allspice
ingredient.9.description: Warm spice con clavo, canela, y nuez moscada notes often used in **Tiki** syrups y punches.
ingredient.10.name: Allspice Dram
ingredient.10.description: Allspice-flavored licor around 22% % vol., is used in **Tiki** cocktails.
ingredient.11.name: Almond (Orgeat) Jarabe
ingredient.11.description:
Almond jarabe, aka *orgeat*, is a dulce, nutty jarabe made from **almonds**, **azúcar**, y **naranja flower agua**. It adds a creamy, aromatic quality to tropical y **Tiki** cocktails.
Instructions:
1. **Toast & grind:** preheat oven to 200°c. Toast **almonds** para 3-4 minutes until fragrant. Let cool, then pulse in a food processor until coarsely ground.
2. **Make jarabe:** combine **azúcar** y **agua** in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir until dissolved, bring to a boil para 3 minutes, then add the ground almonds.
3. **Steep:** lower the heat y simmer para 3 minutes. Remove from heat, cover, y let infuse para 3 to 12 hours at room temperature.
4. **Strain:** pour through several layers de cheesecloth o a nut leche bag, squeezing hard to extract all almond oils y liquid.
5. **Finish:** stir in **naranja flower agua**. Transfer to a clean bottle.
ingredient.12.name: Amaretto
ingredient.12.description: Amaretto is an Italian almond licor at 21-28% % vol. con a dulce, nutty flavour. Use it in **Godfather**.
ingredient.13.name: Amaro
ingredient.13.description: Amaro is a agridulce Italian herbal licor produced by infusing alcohol con a blend de botanicals, including herbs, roots, spices, y citrus peels, then sweetening it y ageing the mixture.
ingredient.14.name: Amaro Averna
ingredient.14.description: Amaro Averna is an Italian herbal licor con an alcohol content de 29% % vol. (58 proof). This Sicilian agridulce digestif. Ideal para **Negro Manhattan**.
ingredient.15.name: Amaro Montenegro
ingredient.15.description: Amaro Montenegro is a herbal Italian amaro from Bologna, 23% % vol. Mix it in a **Monte & Tónica** o **Paper Plane**.
ingredient.16.name: Amaro Nonino
ingredient.16.description: Amaro Nonino is a amargosweet amaro from Nonino Distillatori at 35% % vol. Ideal in a **Paper Plane** o **Negro Manhattan**.
ingredient.17.name: Amontillado Sherry
ingredient.17.description: Nutty, amber sherry that begins as Fino before ageing oxidatively, around 16-18% % vol. Seco con savoury, toasted notes. Adds depth to cobblers y stirred cocktails.
ingredient.18.name: Angelica root
ingredient.18.description: Earthy, herbal root that adds seco amargoness to gins y aromatic amargos.
ingredient.19.name: Angostura Amargos
ingredient.19.description: Concentrated Trinidad amargos at 44.7% % vol. made con gentian, herbs, y spices. Famous oversized label y closely guarded recipe. a few golpees add spice y amargoness to classics like the **Old Fashioned** o **Manhattan**.
ingredient.20.name: Anise
ingredient.20.description: Licorice-scented spice that brightens syrups, liqueurs, y adornoes.
ingredient.21.name: Aniseed Licor
ingredient.21.description: Aniseed is a dulce anise-flavored licor, typically 20-40% % vol. Try it in a **Greta Garbo** o **Northern Ligero**.
ingredient.22.name: Anisette
ingredient.22.description: Dulce anise-flavored licor around 25% % vol. Clear y aromatic con liquorice character. Served frío, con café, o in pastis-style mixes.
ingredient.23.name: Aperol
ingredient.23.description: Aperol is a bright naranja aperitif from the Campari group, 11% % vol., con amargo citrus y rhubarb notes. Perfect para an **Aperol Spritz** o **Paper Plane**.
ingredient.24.name: Manzana
ingredient.24.description: Crisp, sweet-tart fruit used para juices, adornoes, y infusions. Adds fresco orchard aroma to cocktails.
ingredient.25.name: Manzana Brandy
ingredient.25.description: Fruit brandy distilled from apples, typically 40-50% % vol. Offers baked-apple y spice notes from barrel ageing. Great in **Jack Rose**-style cocktails.
ingredient.26.name: Manzana Cider
ingredient.26.description: Manzana cider is a crisp fermented manzana cóctel at 4-6% % vol. Enjoy it in a **Snakebite** o **Stone Fence**.
ingredient.27.name: Manzana Zumo
ingredient.27.description: Dulce pressed manzana zumo con crisp acidity. Adds gentle fruitiness to punches y highballs. Works con ron, bourbon, y cider-inspired cocktails.
ingredient.28.name: Manzana Licor
ingredient.28.description: Manzana licor is a dulce manzana spirit around 15-30% % vol. Shake it into **Appletini** o **manzana Jack** cocktails.
ingredient.29.name: Manzana Schnapps
ingredient.29.description: Manzana schnapps is a tart manzana spirit con roughly 15-25% % vol. Use it in an **manzana Pie shot** o **Appletini** cocktail.
ingredient.30.name: Applejack
ingredient.30.description: American manzana spirit is often blended con neutral grain, usually 40-50% % vol. Brings baked-apple flavour con subtle oak. Classic choice para **Jack Rose** y **Old Fashioned** riffs.
ingredient.31.name: Albaricoque Brandy
ingredient.31.description: Apricot-based brandy o licor con stone-fruit dulzor, usually 30-40% % vol. Adds jammy orchard notes to cocktails. Useful in sours y Tiki cóctels.
ingredient.32.name: Albaricoque Nectar
ingredient.32.description: Dulce, thick albaricoque zumo blend that brings mellow stone-fruit flavour. Great para Tiki cóctels, spritzes, y punches.
ingredient.33.name: Ardbeg
ingredient.33.description: Islay single malt scotch is famed para intense peat smoke y maritime notes, typically around 46% % vol. Distilled on Islay’s south coast. Bold choice para **Penicillin** variations o neat sipping.
ingredient.34.name: Bacardi 151 Proof Ron
ingredient.34.description: Very high-proof ron at 75½% % vol. once made by bacardi. Powerful caramel y molasses notes suited to punches o flaming cóctels. Handle carefully y dilute in cocktails.
ingredient.35.name: Baileys
ingredient.35.description: Baileys Irish nata is a creamy licor by Diageo, 17% % vol., con chocolate y whisky notes. Serve in a **Mudslide** o **B-52**.
ingredient.36.name: Plátano
ingredient.36.description: Soft, dulce fruit con creamy texture used para smoothies y Tiki adornoes. Works well in frozen cocktails o batched punches.
ingredient.37.name: Plátano Licor
ingredient.37.description: Plátano licor is a dulce plátano spirit about 20-25% % vol. Mix it in a **Plátano Daiquiri** o **Dirty Plátano**.
ingredient.38.name: Plátano Licor Verde
ingredient.38.description: Vivid verde plátano licor con dulce tropical aroma around 20-25% % vol. Adds color y ripe plátano notes to Tiki cóctels y dessert cocktails.
ingredient.39.name: Albahaca
ingredient.39.description: Albahaca is a fragrant herb con a dulce, slightly peppery flavour. It adds a fresco y aromatic note to both alcoholic y non-alcoholic cocktails. Common in summer cóctels, it pairs especially well con **ginebra**, **vodka**, y citrus juices.
ingredient.40.name: Becherovka
ingredient.40.description: Becherovka is a traditional, 100% natural czech herbal licor, made con a secret recipe de over 20 herbs y spices y an alcohol by volume (% vol.) de 38%. It is often enjoyed as a digestif.
ingredient.41.name: Beef Bouillon
ingredient.41.description: Beef bouillon is a savoury broth made by simmering beef con vegetables y seasonings. In cocktails, it is primarily used in savoury cóctels like the **Bloody Bull**, adding depth y umami richness.
ingredient.42.name: Cerveza
ingredient.42.description: Cerveza is a carbonated malt beverage around 4-6% % vol. con malty, hoppy notes. Añade it into a **Michelada** o **Shandy**.
ingredient.43.name: Benedictine
ingredient.43.description: French herbal licor around 40% % vol. con honeyed dulzor y spice. Created by Alexandre le Grand from a secret blend de botanicals. Essential in cóctels like the **Vieux Carré** y **Singapore Sling**.
ingredient.44.name: Berentzen Apfelkorn
ingredient.44.description: Berentzen Apfelkorn is a German manzana schnapps by Berentzen Group, 18% % vol. Enjoy it in an **manzana Shot** o **manzana Strudel** cocktail.
ingredient.45.name: Berries
ingredient.45.description: Mixed berries that deliver bright acidity y deep color. Perfect para dousing into **Spritzes** y **Sangria**.
ingredient.46.name: Bianco Vermú
ingredient.46.description: Vermú is an aromatised fortified vino around 15-18% % vol. Use it in a **Martini** o **Negroni**.
ingredient.47.name: Bison Grass Vodka
ingredient.47.description: Polish bison grass **vodka** (Żubrówka) around 37½-40% % vol. flavored con aromatic dulce grass. Offers vainilla, almond, y herb notes. Great con manzana zumo o in refreshing highballs.
ingredient.48.name: Bittermens Boston Bittahs
ingredient.48.description: Citrus-forward amargos con pomelo y hop notes. Brightens ginebra, ron, o **tequila** cocktails con gentle amargoness. Use a golpe o two to add sparkle without heavy spice.
ingredient.49.name: Amargos
ingredient.49.description: Aromatic amargos are alcohol-based flavour concentrates infusionado con herbs y spices. Just a few golpees add amargoness, spice, y balance to cocktails. Keep them on the rail para **Old Fashioneds**, **Manhattans**, y sours.
ingredient.50.name: Negro Pimienta
ingredient.50.description: Cracked peppercorn heat para savoury cocktails o rimming a spicy **Bloody Mary**.
ingredient.51.name: Negro Sambuca
ingredient.51.description: Oscuro anise licor con added liquorice y spice, around 38% % vol. Richer y slightly amargo compared to blanco sambuca. Served as shots, con café, o flaming in cocktails.
ingredient.52.name: Negro Tea
ingredient.52.description: Negro tea is a strong, full-bodied tea con a intenso, tannic flavour. It can be used as a base para tea cocktails o as an infusionado mixer con spirits. Its bold taste pairs well con whisky, ron, y fruit liqueurs.
ingredient.53.name: Mora
ingredient.53.description: Juicy oscuro berry con sweet-tart flavour. Ideal para muddling into brambles o simmering into berry syrups.
ingredient.54.name: Mora Brandy
ingredient.54.description: Brandy o licor flavored con blackberries, typically 30-40% % vol. Dulce, jammy berry notes con a warming finish. Works in sours, cobblers, y dessert cóctels.
ingredient.55.name: Mora Licor
ingredient.55.description: Mora licor offers intenso berry dulzor at about 18-20% % vol. Use it in a **Bramble** o **Mora Martini**.
ingredient.56.name: Blackcurrant Cordial
ingredient.56.description: Dulce blackcurrant jarabe con deep berry color y tangy dulzor. Dilute con soda o agua para a refreshing base. Great para spritzes, punches, o zero-proof cocktails.
ingredient.57.name: Blackstrap Ron
ingredient.57.description: Blackstrap ron is an intensely oscuro, full-bodied spirit characterised by a heavy molasses flavour profile. Unlike most rums that aim para smoothness o "funk," blackstrap is often thick, syrupy, y contains amargosweet notes de café, liquorice, y burnt azúcar.
ingredient.58.name: Blood Naranja
ingredient.58.description: Deep red-fleshed naranja con berry-like citrus flavour. Anthocyanin pigments give it a vivid hue that develops in cool nights. Great para adding color to sours y spritzes.
ingredient.59.name: Blue Curaçao
ingredient.59.description: Blue curaçao is a blue-dyed naranja licor, 20-25% % vol., con amargo citrus flavour. Star de the **Blue Lagoon** y **Blue Hawaii**.
ingredient.60.name: Blue Curaçao Jarabe
ingredient.60.description: Blue curaçao jarabe delivers dulce naranja flavour con a vivid blue hue. It mimics the taste de curaçao licor without alcohol. Great para colourful tropical cocktails y lemonades.
ingredient.61.name: Arándano
ingredient.61.description: Blueberries are an incredibly versatile cocktail ingredient, prized para their deep purple hue y balanced sweet-tart profile. They pair exceptionally well con **ginebra**, **vodka**, **tequila**, y **bourbon**.
ingredient.62.name: Arándano Schnapps
ingredient.62.description: Arándano schnapps is a fruity schnapps around 15-25% % vol. Try it in a **berry Kamikaze** o **Arándano Martini**.
ingredient.63.name: Boiling Agua
ingredient.63.description: Freshly boiled agua used to dilute o build hot cóctels. Essential para toddies, teas, y grogs. Use just off the boil to avoid scalding spirits o citrus.
ingredient.64.name: Borage
ingredient.64.description: Borage has a crisp, cucumber-like flavour that brings refreshing aroma to spritzes y highballs. the star-shaped blue flowers make striking adornoes para **ginebra** o **tequila** cóctels. Muddle gently o float the blossoms to keep their delicate look.
ingredient.65.name: Bourbon
ingredient.65.description: American whisky made primarily from corn y añejo in new charred oak, usually 40-50% % vol. Offers caramel, vainilla, y baking spice notes. Staple para **Old Fashioneds**, **Manhattans**, y many classics.
ingredient.66.name: Brandy
ingredient.66.description: Distilled vino spirit añejo in oak, commonly 36-60% % vol. Smooth notes de seco fruit, vainilla, y oak. Versatile para sipping neat o mixing in **sidecars** y **punches**.
ingredient.67.name: Brown Azúcar
ingredient.67.description: Brown azúcar is fine, moist cane azúcar con molasses added back para color y flavour. It dissolves quickly y brings caramel notes to syrups y hot cóctels. Ligero y oscuro varieties offer different molasses intensity.
ingredient.68.name: Butter
ingredient.68.description: Butter is churned dairy fat that adds richness y a silky mouthfeel. a small knob can soften boozy edges o balance spices in warm cocktails.
ingredient.69.name: Butterfinger candy bar
ingredient.69.description: Butterfinger is a candy bar manufactured by the ferrara candy company, a subsidiary de ferrero. the bar consists de a layered crispy peanut butter core covered in chocolate.
ingredient.70.name: Butterscotch Licor
ingredient.70.description: Butterscotch licor is a dulce caramel spirit about 15% % vol. Works in a butterball o caramel appletini.
ingredient.71.name: Butterscotch Schnapps
ingredient.71.description: Butterscotch schnapps is a toffee-flavored schnapps around 15-20% % vol. Ideal para a **Buttery Nipple** o **Oatmeal Cookie shot**.
ingredient.72.name: Cachaça
ingredient.72.description: Cachaça (Portuguese pronunciation: [kaˈʃasɐ]) is a distilled spirit made from fermented sugarcane zumo. Also known as aguardente, pinga, caninha y other names, it is the most popular distilled alcoholic beverage in Brazil. Outside Brazil, cachaça is used almost exclusively as an ingredient in tropical cóctels, con the **Caipirinha** being the most famous cocktail.
ingredient.73.name: Calvados
ingredient.73.description: Calvados is an manzana brandy from the Normandy region de France, con an % vol. typically between 40% y 45%. It has a complex flavour profile combining baked manzana, spice, y oak notes. Calvados is often enjoyed neat o used in cocktails that highlight its intenso fruit character.
ingredient.74.name: Campari
ingredient.74.description: Campari is a amargo naranja aperitif by Campari group, roughly 20-28% % vol. Essential in a **Negroni** o **Americano**.
ingredient.75.name: Caramel Jarabe
ingredient.75.description: Caramel jarabe is a dulce, intenso liquid made by caramelizing azúcar y mixing it con agua. It adds a toasty, buttery dulzor to cocktails, café cóctels, y desserts. Perfect para enhancing creamy y dessert-style cocktails.
ingredient.76.name: Cardamom
ingredient.76.description: Fragrant cardamom pods bring citrusy, eucalyptus spice to syrups y infusions.
ingredient.77.name: Carpano Antica Formula Vermú
ingredient.77.description: A rosso/dulce vermú on steroids con plentiful seco fruit y vainilla tobacco.
ingredient.78.name: Celery
ingredient.78.description: Celery provides a fresco, crisp, y slightly peppery flavour to cocktails. It is commonly used as a adorno para Bloody Marys y other savoury cóctels. Celery zumo o muddled stalks can also add a refreshing vegetal note.
ingredient.79.name: Celery Sal
ingredient.79.description: Seasoned sal con celery seed that adds savoury lift to Bloody Marys y micheladas.
ingredient.80.name: Chambord
ingredient.80.description: Chambord is a negro frambuesa licor from France by brown‑forman, 16.5% % vol. Great in a French martini o Kir Royale.
ingredient.81.name: Chamomile Cordial
ingredient.81.description: Chamomile cordial is a dulce, floral jarabe made from chamomile flowers. It has a soothing aroma y mild honey-like taste, making it a calming addition to cocktails. Pairs well con **ginebra**, **vodka**, y citrus juices.
ingredient.82.name: Chamomile flowers
ingredient.82.description: Chamomile flowers come from daisy-like plants y are primarily used para making calming herbal teas, in cooking, y in cosmetics due to their apple-like aroma.
ingredient.83.name: Champagne
ingredient.83.description: Champagne is a French espumoso vino around 12% % vol. con crisp bubbles. Añade it in **Mimosa** o **French 75**.
ingredient.84.name: Cereza
ingredient.84.description: Dulce o tart rojo stone fruit often used as a adorno o muddled ingredient. Adds a pop de color y gentle dulzor.
ingredient.85.name: Cereza Brandy
ingredient.85.description: Cherry-based brandy o licor con deep rojo fruit character, around 30-40% % vol. Can be seco kirsch-style o endulzado. Adds cereza richness to classics like the **Singapore Sling**.
ingredient.86.name: Cereza Heering
ingredient.86.description: Cereza Heering is a Danish cereza licor by Heering, 24% % vol. Use it in a **Singapore Sling** o **Blood & Sand**.
ingredient.87.name: Cereza Zumo
ingredient.87.description: Tart, ruby-coloured zumo con intenso cereza flavour. Ideal para sours, spritzes, o topping soda cocktails. Balances whisky y ron cóctels.
ingredient.88.name: Cereza Licor
ingredient.88.description: Cereza licor is a sweet-tart cereza spirit about 20% % vol. Mix it in a **Singapore Sling** o **cereza Smash**.
ingredient.89.name: Chestnut Licor
ingredient.89.description: Chestnut licor is nutty y dulce con 15-20% % vol. Try it in **Silver Bay** o **Apicius** cocktail.
ingredient.90.name: Chili Pimienta
ingredient.90.description: Fresco chilli pimienta adds bright heat to cocktails.
ingredient.91.name: Chili Polvo
ingredient.91.description: Chili polvo provides a warm, ahumado heat that enhances savoury y adventurous cocktails. It is often used as a copa rim seasoning o mixed into syrups. Works well in **tequila** y **mezcal**-based cóctels.
ingredient.92.name: Chocolate
ingredient.92.description: Intenso cocoa-based ingredient used para desserts y cocktails. Shavings o chunks add aroma y slight amargoness. Perfect para adornoing creamy o café cóctels.
ingredient.93.name: Chocolate Amargos
ingredient.93.description: Chocolate amargos are aromatic amargos con cocoa y spice flavours, typically around 40-45% % vol. They add depth to **whisky**, **ron**, y **tequila** cocktails. a small golpe can transform a dessert cocktail o **Old Fashioned**.
ingredient.94.name: Chocolate Licor
ingredient.94.description: Chocolate licor is a cocoa-flavored spirit roughly 15-20% % vol. Serve it in a **Chocolate Martini** o **Mudslide**.
ingredient.95.name: Chocolate Jarabe
ingredient.95.description: Chocolate jarabe is a intenso cocoa sweetener used para dessert cóctels. It adds chocolate aroma y body to milkshakes o creamy cocktails. Drizzle inside copaes para adorno.
ingredient.96.name: Canela
ingredient.96.description: Dulce warming spice that blends into syrups y dustings para Tiki y winter cóctels.
ingredient.97.name: Canela Sticks
ingredient.97.description: Canela sticks provide a warm, dulce spice when infusionado o used as a adorno. They release flavour gradually, making them ideal para hot cocktails. They also serve as decorative stirrers in seasonal cóctels.
ingredient.98.name: Canela Jarabe
ingredient.98.description: Canela jarabe combines azúcar con warming canela spice. It brings cosy baking notes to Tiki cóctels, punches, o café cocktails. Keep refrigerated para best flavour.
ingredient.99.name: Cloves
ingredient.99.description: Potent warming buds used sparingly in syrups, mulled mixes, y adornoes.
ingredient.100.name: Coca-Cola
ingredient.100.description: Coca-Cola is a caramelised cola soda created in the late 19th Century. Its blend de caffeine, dulzor, y spice makes it a versatile mixer con ron o whisky. Bottlers worldwide sell it in cans, bottles, y fountain formats.
ingredient.101.name: Cocoa Polvo
ingredient.101.description: Unsweetened cocoa polvo delivers intense chocolate flavour. Dust over cóctels o mix into syrups para a amargosweet note. Bloom in warm liquid to avoid clumping.
ingredient.102.name: Coco Nata
ingredient.102.description: Coco nata is a thick, intenso product made from coco flesh. It lends a smooth texture y tropical dulzor to cocktails like the **Piña Colada**. Perfect para creamy, dessert-like tropical cóctels.
ingredient.103.name: Coco Flakes
ingredient.103.description: Seco coco shreds con dulce, tropical aroma. Toast them para deeper flavour before using as a adorno. Can be infusionado into syrups o leche para Tiki-style cóctels.
ingredient.104.name: Coco Licor
ingredient.104.description: Coco licor is a tropical dulce spirit around 15-21% % vol. Blend it into a **Bahama Mama** o **Rafaello**.
ingredient.105.name: Coco Leche
ingredient.105.description: Coco leche is pressed from coco flesh, giving a creamy texture con mild dulzor. It adds body y tropical flavour to blended cóctels y punches.
ingredient.106.name: Coco Ron
ingredient.106.description: Coco ron infuses ron con coco at about 21% % vol. Best in a **Piña Colada** o **Painkiller**.
ingredient.107.name: Coco Jarabe
ingredient.107.description:
Coco jarabe delivers dulce, creamy coco flavour in a pourable form. Use it to mimic coco nata without the heaviness. Perfect para Coladas, Spritzers, o café cóctels.
Instructions: 
· 400 g de blanco azúcar,
· 400 ml de unsweetened full-fat coco leche,
· a pinch de sal.
In a medium saucepan, combine azúcar, coco leche, y sal. Stir over heat until azúcar is completely dissolved.
ingredient.108.name: Coco Agua
ingredient.108.description: Ligero, naturally dulce agua from young coconuts. Adds subtle coco flavour y electrolytes to low-% vol. o nonalcoholic cóctels. Refreshing mixer con **ron**, **tequila**, o tropical fruit.
ingredient.109.name: Café Beans
ingredient.109.description: Café beans are used to infuse spirits o adorno coffee-flavored cocktails. They release aroma without adding dulzor. a single bean is often floated on cóctels para decoration.
ingredient.110.name: Café Brandy
ingredient.110.description: Café brandy combines roasted café y brandy, roughly 20-30% % vol. Enjoy in a **Alexander the Great** o **Brandy Separator**.
ingredient.111.name: Café Licor
ingredient.111.description: Café licor is a dulce café spirit at 20-30% % vol. Perfect para a **Blanco Lebowski** o **Espresso Martini**.
ingredient.112.name: Cognac
ingredient.112.description: French grape brandy from the Cognac region, double-distilled y añejo in oak at 40% % vol. Shows seco fruit, vainilla, y floral notes. Premium choice para sipping o cocktails like the **Sidecar**.
ingredient.113.name: Cointreau
ingredient.113.description: Cointreau is an orange-flavored triple sec licor. It is consumed as an apéritif y digestif, y is a component de several well-known cocktails. It was originally called Curaçao Blanco triple sec.
ingredient.114.name: Cola
ingredient.114.description: Cola is a dulce, carbonated beverage con caramel, vainilla, y spice notes. It pairs well con ron, whisky, y other oscuro spirits. Adds dulzor, color, y effervescence to cocktails.
ingredient.115.name: Condensed Leche
ingredient.115.description: Condensed leche is cow's leche reduced con azúcar into a thick, shelf-stable jarabe. It sweetens y enriches café cocktails, dessert cóctels, y vietnamese-inspired mixes.
ingredient.116.name: Coriander
ingredient.116.description: Citrusy coriander seeds used to add bright spice to gin-inspired syrups y amargos.
ingredient.117.name: Corn Jarabe
ingredient.117.description: Corn jarabe is a neutral, viscous sweetener made from corn starch. It keeps sauces smooth y prevents crystallization in syrups. Bartenders sometimes use it para stable homemade sodas o adornoes.
ingredient.118.name: Corona
ingredient.118.description: Corona is a pale lager from Mexico, 4.5% % vol. Serve it in **Michelada** o **Corona Sunrise**.
ingredient.119.name: Cranberry Zumo
ingredient.119.description: Cranberry zumo is a tart, ruby cóctel often endulzado para cocktails. It adds acidity y color to cóctels like the **Cosmopolitan** y **Cape Cod**.
ingredient.120.name: Nata
ingredient.120.description: Nata is the high-fat layer skimmed from leche. It lends body y mellow dulzor to shaken cóctels, flips, y dessert cocktails.
ingredient.121.name: Creole Amargos
ingredient.121.description: Spice-driven amargos con baking spice, anise, y pimienta notes. Great para **ron** y **rye** cocktails needing warmth y depth. Use sparingly to avoid overpowering citrus.
ingredient.122.name: Crown Royal
ingredient.122.description: Crown Royal, originally known as Seagram's Crown Royal, is a blended Canadian whisky.
ingredient.123.name: Crème de Banane
ingredient.123.description: Crème de Banane is a plátano licor about 20% % vol. Use it in a **Plátano Daiquiri** o **Bananarama**.
ingredient.124.name: Crème de Cacao Brown
ingredient.124.description: Oscuro Crème de Cacao is a chocolate licor around 20-25% % vol. Mix it in a **Brandy Alexander** o **Chocolate Martini**.
ingredient.125.name: Crème de Cacao Blanco
ingredient.125.description: Blanco Crème de Cacao is a clear cocoa licor around 20-25% % vol. Ideal in a **Grasshopper** o **Alexander**.
ingredient.126.name: Crème de Cafe
ingredient.126.description: Coffee-flavored licor con a smooth, dulce roast profile. Use it para **Blanco Lebowski**, **espresso** cocktails, o dessert cóctels.
ingredient.127.name: Crème de Cassis
ingredient.127.description: Crème de Cassis is a blackcurrant licor from France, 15-20% % vol. Key para a **Kir** o **El Diablo**.
ingredient.128.name: Crème de Menthe Verde
ingredient.128.description: Verde Crème de Menthe is a menta licor about 25% % vol. Use it in a **Grasshopper** o **Alexander's Sister**.
ingredient.129.name: Crème de Menthe Blanco
ingredient.129.description: Blanco Crème de Menthe is a clear menta licor about 25% % vol. Try it in a **Stinger** o **Verde Tea** cocktail.
ingredient.130.name: Crème de Mure
ingredient.130.description: Crème de Mûre is a mora licor around 20% % vol. Ideal para a **Bramble** y **Mûre Royale**.
ingredient.131.name: Crème de Violette
ingredient.131.description: Crème de Violette is a floral violet licor at 16-20% % vol. Classic in an **Aviation** o **Blue Moon**.
ingredient.132.name: Cuban Aguardiente
ingredient.132.description: Cuban sugarcane spirit around 30-40% % vol. con grassy, lightly dulce profile. Distilled from fermented molasses o zumo. Used in traditional cuban cocktails y celebratory shots.
ingredient.133.name: Cucumber
ingredient.133.description: Cool, crisp fruit con refreshing vegetal notes. Excellent para muddling into ginebra cocktails y ligero spritzes.
ingredient.134.name: Cynar
ingredient.134.description: Cynar is an artichoke-based Italian amaro by the Campari group, 16.5% % vol. Mix it in a **Cynar Spritz** o **Amargo Giuseppe**.
ingredient.135.name: Daiquiri Amargos
ingredient.135.description: Amargos designed to complement ron y lima cóctels. Adds bright spice y subtle tropical amargoness without masking acidity. a golpe sharpens daiquiris o other ligero ron cocktails.
ingredient.136.name: Oscuro Ron
ingredient.136.description: Oscuro ron añejo longer o con added molasses para deep caramel color, typically 40-50% % vol. flavours de brown azúcar, spice, y vainilla. Great in Tiki cóctels y punches.
ingredient.137.name: Demerara Ron
ingredient.137.description: Ron made from demerara azúcar, often from guyana, around 40-50% % vol. Intenso molasses, smoke, y toffee notes. Adds depth to Tiki cocktails y stirred ron cóctels.
ingredient.138.name: Demerara Azúcar
ingredient.138.description: Demerara azúcar has large, crunchy crystals con natural molasses. It brings toffee-like dulzor y texture to syrups y muddled cóctels. Less processed than standard brown azúcar, so flavours stay mellow.
ingredient.139.name: Demerara Azúcar Jarabe
ingredient.139.description:
2 Parts demerara azúcar to 1 part agua.
Instructions: 
1. Añade the 2 parts de azúcar y 1 part agua to a small saucepan.
2. Place over medium-low heat. Stir gently y continuously until the azúcar crystals are completely dissolved.
ingredient.140.name: Disaronno Velvet
ingredient.140.description:
Disaronno Velvet is a smooth, all-white nata licor that blends the classic almond flavour de the original disaronno con creamy, velvety notes de chocolate y vainilla.
Disaronno Velvet has an alcohol by volume (% vol.) de 17% y is designed to be enjoyed primarily over ice.
ingredient.141.name: Don's Mix
ingredient.141.description:
Don's Mix — the legendary secret ingredient in Tiki classics like the **Zombie** — is actually quite simple once you break it down into two parts: **canela jarabe** y **blanco pomelo zumo**.
Instructions:
**Make the canela jarabe**
The "secret" to the mix is a basic jarabe simple infusionado con canela. 
Ingredients: 240 g de azúcar, 240 ml de agua, y 3 canela sticks.
1. Crush the canela sticks (using a rolling pin o mallet) into smaller pieces to release more flavour.
2. Combine the azúcar, agua, y crushed canela in a saucepan.
3. Bring the mixture to a boil, stirring until the azúcar is fully dissolved.
4. Reduce the heat y simmer para about 2 minutes.
5. Remove from heat, cover the pan, y let it sit para at least 2 hours.
6. Añade the jarabe through a fine-mesh strainer o cheesecloth into a jar. 
**Blend the Final Mix**
Combine 2 parts blanco pomelo zumo con 1 part canela jarabe.
ingredient.142.name: Drambuie
ingredient.142.description: Scottish licor blending Scotch whisky con heather miel, herbs, y spices at about 40% % vol. Smooth, dulce, y especiado. Signature ingredient in the **Rusty Nail**.
ingredient.143.name: Seco Albaricoque
ingredient.143.description: Chewy, concentrated albaricoque con honeyed dulzor. Great para infusions, adornoes, o simmering into jarabe.
ingredient.144.name: Seco Vermú
ingredient.144.description: Seco vermú is an herbal fortified vino around 15-18% % vol. Essential para a **Martini** o **Gibson**.
ingredient.145.name: Dubonnet
ingredient.145.description: Dubonnet is a dulce aperitif by Pernod Ricard, about 14.8% % vol., con especiado vino notes. Serve in a **Dubonnet cocktail**.
ingredient.146.name: Earl Gray Tea
ingredient.146.description: Negro tea scented con bergamot citrus. Steeped leaves make aromatic syrups o tea bases para spritzes y toddies. Slight amargoness pairs well con **ginebra** o **whisky**.
ingredient.147.name: Egg
ingredient.147.description: Whole huevo adds richness y foam to flips y nogs. Shake hard to fully emulsify. Use fresco huevos y follow safe-handling guidelines.
ingredient.148.name: Egg Licor (Advocaat)
ingredient.148.description: Egg licor is a creamy huevo-based spirit at 14-20% % vol. Sip it in a **Snowball** o **Dutch Café**.
ingredient.149.name: Egg Blanco
ingredient.149.description: Egg blanco creates silky texture y a stable foam in sours y fizzes. Seco shake first to build structure, then add ice to chill. Always use fresco huevos o pasteurized cartons.
ingredient.150.name: Egg Yolk
ingredient.150.description: Egg yolk delivers custardy body to flips y huevonog-style cóctels. Combine con azúcar y spice para dessert-like cocktails. Use immediately y keep frío para safety.
ingredient.151.name: Elderflower Cordial
ingredient.151.description: Elderflower cordial is a soft cóctel made largely from a refined azúcar y agua solution y uses the flowers de the european elderberry.
ingredient.152.name: Espresso Café
ingredient.152.description: Concentrated café shot con intenso crema y intense amargoness. Adds depth to café cocktails like an **Espresso Martini**. Use freshly pulled espresso para the best foam y aroma.
ingredient.153.name: Everclear
ingredient.153.description: Neutral grain spirit sold at very high proofs up to 95% % vol. Odourless y colourless, used para infusions y punches. Must be heavily diluted before cócteling.
ingredient.154.name: Falernum
ingredient.154.description: Falernum is a Caribbean jarabe flavored con almond, jengibre, lima, y baking spices. It can be alcoholic o not but is always thick y lightly especiado. Use it to bring tropical warmth to Tiki recipes.
ingredient.155.name: Fernet Branca
ingredient.155.description: Fernet is a type de Italian amaro con an % vol. de 39-45%. It is intensely amargo y herbal, con notes de menta, myrrh, y saffron. Often taken as a shot o used sparingly in cocktails para depth.
ingredient.156.name: Fig
ingredient.156.description: Fig adds a intenso, gently dulce flavour con notes de miel, seco fruit, y a hint de earthiness. In cocktails, it brings warmth y depth, pairing beautifully con **whisky**, **ron**, **brandy**, y herbal liqueurs. Perfect para autumnal, dessert, o slow-sipping cóctels.
ingredient.157.name: Fino Sherry
ingredient.157.description: Pale, bone-dry sherry añejo under flor con delicate almond y saline notes. Sip frío o mix into ligero, nutty cocktails.
ingredient.158.name: Frangelico
ingredient.158.description: Frangelico is an Italian hazelnut licor by Gruppo Campari, 20% % vol. Works in a **Nutty Martini** o a **Chocolate Cake Shot**.
ingredient.159.name: Fresca
ingredient.159.description: Fresca is a grapefruit-flavored diet soda con a crisp, seco finish. Zero azúcar keeps cocktails lighter while adding bubbles. Mix con **tequila**, **ginebra**, o **vodka** para bright spritzes.
ingredient.160.name: Galliano
ingredient.160.description: Italian vanilla-anise herbal licor around 30% % vol. Tall golden bottle con flavours de vainilla, citrus, y spice. Key para **Harvey Wallbangers** y modern café cóctels.
ingredient.161.name: Ginebra
ingredient.161.description: Juniper-forward distilled spirit flavored con botanicals, typically 40-47% % vol. Offers piney, citrus, y spice notes depending on style. Foundation para **Martinis**, **Ginebra y Tonics**, y many classics.
ingredient.162.name: Jengibre
ingredient.162.description: Spicy, aromatic root used fresco o ground para syrups, mules, y punches.
ingredient.163.name: Jengibre Ale
ingredient.163.description: Jengibre ale is a carbonated soft cóctel flavored con jengibre.
ingredient.164.name: Jengibre Cerveza
ingredient.164.description: Jengibre cerveza is a endulzado y carbonated, usually non-alcoholic beverage, a type de soft cóctel. Historically it was a type de cerveza brewed by the natural fermentation de prepared jengibre spice, yeast y azúcar.
ingredient.165.name: Jengibre Candy
ingredient.165.description: Dulce, spicy candied jengibre pieces. Chop para adorno o muddle to add heat y aroma. Jarabe from the jar can sweeten highballs o teas.
ingredient.166.name: Jengibre Jarabe
ingredient.166.description:
Jengibre jarabe packs spicy, fresco jengibre heat balanced con dulzor. It mixes easily into highballs, sours, y zero-proof cóctels. Adds a zesty kick without muddying fresco jengibre.
**Instructions:**
· 360g de blanco azúcar,
· 240 ml de agua,
· 240g de fresco jengibre
1. Peel the jengibre y slice it into small pieces. Set aside. 
2. In a medium saucepan, combine azúcar y agua. 
3. Stir over heat until azúcar is completely dissolved. 
4. Añade sliced jengibre y simmer para 3-5 minutes. Remove from heat. 
5. Seal y steep in the refrigerator para up to 24 hours. 
6. Strain jarabe con a fine mesh strainer once steeping is complete.
ingredient.167.name: Godiva Licor
ingredient.167.description: Godiva licor is a Belgian chocolate spirit con about 15% % vol. Enjoy it in a **Chocolate Martini** o **Mocha Mudslide**.
ingredient.168.name: Gold Jamaican Ron
ingredient.168.description: The primary difference para gold Jamaican ron lies in its ageing process, which gives it a richer, more complex flavour profile than blanco ron, while being less bold y añejo than oscuro ron. Jamaican Rums in general are known para their distinct "funky" character due to a unique high-ester fermentation process.
ingredient.169.name: Gold Puerto Rican Ron
ingredient.169.description: Lightly añejo gold ron from puerto rico, around 40% % vol. Soft vainilla y caramel notes con a smooth finish. Reliable mixing ron para tropical cocktails.
ingredient.170.name: Gold Ron
ingredient.170.description:
Gold ron y especiado ron are distinct types de ron, differing primarily in their production y flavour profiles.

Gold ron features a smooth, intenso flavour con notes de caramel, vainilla, y spice, often con hints de oak.
Añejo in oak barrels, con the ageing process contributing to both color y flavour.
ingredient.171.name: Goldschläger
ingredient.171.description: Swiss canela schnapps around 43% % vol. con floating gold flakes. Dulce, spicy, y eye-catching. Often enjoyed frío o in party shots.
ingredient.172.name: Gomme Jarabe
ingredient.172.description: Gomme jarabe is a cóctel sweetener commonly used instead de jarabe simple in many classic cocktail recipes. While some people may refer to jarabe simple as gum jarabe, true gum jarabe contains an emulsifier known as gum arabic, a natural gum made from the sap de two types de acacia tree.
ingredient.173.name: Goslings Ron
ingredient.173.description: Bermudian ron is best known para negro seal, about 40-48% % vol. Oscuro, intenso molasses character con a hint de spice. Classic choice para a **Oscuro 'n Stormy** o **Tiki** cóctels.
ingredient.174.name: Gran Classico
ingredient.174.description: Gran Classico is a Swiss amargo aperitivo by Tempus Fugit, 28% % vol. Try it in a **Negroni** o **Spritz**.
ingredient.175.name: Grand Marnier
ingredient.175.description: Grand Marnier is an orange-flavored licor. It is made from a blend de **cognac** brandy, distilled essence de amargo naranja, y azúcar. Grand Marnier Cordon Rouge is 40% alcohol (70 proof in the uk, 80 proof in the US).
ingredient.176.name: Grape Zumo
ingredient.176.description: Dulce purple grape zumo con jammy notes. Useful para spritzes, **Sangria** bases, o nonalcoholic mixes. Pairs con **vodka**, **ginebra**, o **espumoso vino**.
ingredient.177.name: Pomelo
ingredient.177.description: Pomelo adds a tangy, slightly amargo citrus flavour to cocktails. It can be juiced, sliced, o used as a adorno. Works well in **palomas**, **greyhounds**, y **ginebra** cóctels.
ingredient.178.name: Pomelo Zumo
ingredient.178.description: Bitter-sweet citrus zumo con bright aroma. Great para **palomas**, **greyhounds**, y other highballs. Adds refreshing amargoness to balance dulce liqueurs.
ingredient.179.name: Pomelo Soda
ingredient.179.description: Pink pomelo soda is a dulce y tart, espumoso citrus cóctel. It pairs beautifully con **tequila** in a **Paloma**. Adds both flavour y fizz.
ingredient.180.name: Grapes
ingredient.180.description: Juicy berries ranging from dulce to tart depending on the variety. Use para muddling, juicing, o fresco adornoes.
ingredient.181.name: Grappa
ingredient.181.description: Grappa is an Italian pomace brandy con an % vol. de 35-60%. It has a strong, seco, y sometimes floral profile. Traditionally sipped neat after meals.
ingredient.182.name: Verde Chartreuse
ingredient.182.description: Herbal licor made by Carthusian monks con 130 botanicals, bottled at 55% % vol. Vivid verde color con intense herbal, miel, y spice notes. Key ingredient in the **Last Word** y many modern cocktails.
ingredient.183.name: Grenadine
ingredient.183.description: Grenadine is a deep-red, nonalcoholic jarabe con tart-sweet pomegranate flavour. It colours cocktails pink o crimson while adding fruity brightness. Quality versions lean on real pomegranate instead de artificial cereza.
ingredient.184.name: Guinness
ingredient.184.description: Guinness is an Irish stout, 4.2% % vol., con creamy roasted notes. Añade it in a **Negro Velvet** o **Irish Slammer**.
ingredient.185.name: Half-and-half
ingredient.185.description: Half y half is an equal-parts blend de leche y nata typically used in café. It carries about 12.5% butterfat con a ligero, silky texture. Use it when you want more richness than leche without the weight de heavy nata.
ingredient.186.name: Hazelnut Licor
ingredient.186.description: Hazelnut licor is dulce y nutty, around 20% % vol. Use it in a **Nutty Lebowski** o **Hazelnut Martini**.
ingredient.187.name: Heavy Nata
ingredient.187.description: Heavy nata is a high-butterfat dairy product separated from leche. Its richness softens strong spirits y adds velvety texture to flips o dessert cocktails. It can also be whipped para topping boozy cóctels.
ingredient.188.name: Hennessy XO
ingredient.188.description: Hennessy is a world-famous **cognac** brand con an % vol. de 40%. It offers intenso notes de fruit, vainilla, y oak from barrel ageing. Enjoyed neat, on the rocks, o in classic cocktails.
ingredient.189.name: Hibiscus Jarabe
ingredient.189.description: A ruby-red jarabe con tart floral flavour that brings color y brightness to alcohol-free cocktails.
ingredient.190.name: Miel
ingredient.190.description: Natural sweetener con floral notes that vary by bloom. Thicken it into a 1:1 miel jarabe para easier mixing. Balances citrus y whisky cocktails beautifully.
ingredient.191.name: Miel Jarabe
ingredient.191.description:
Usually, in cocktails, a miel jarabe is used con 3 parts de miel y 1 part de agua.
Instructions:
1. Añade 3 parts de miel y 1 part de agua to a small saucepan.
2. Set over low to medium-low heat.
3. Whisk o stir until the miel is fully dissolved in the agua (usually 1-2 minutes).
3. Let it cool to room temperature. 4. Añade into an airtight copa jar o squeeze bottle y refrigerate.
ingredient.192.name: Honeydew Melon
ingredient.192.description: The honeydew melon is a dulce, juicy, y refreshing fruit, known para its pale verde flesh y smooth, creamy-yellow rind when ripe.
ingredient.193.name: Hot Chocolate (Cacao)
ingredient.193.description: Hot chocolate (cacao) is a endulzado cocoa beverage blended con leche o nata. It brings chocolate flavour y warmth to winter cocktails. Spike it con liqueurs o spirits para cosy serves.
ingredient.194.name: Hot Sauce
ingredient.194.description: Vinegar-forward chilli sauce that brings heat to **Michelada**, **Bloody Mary**, y spicy rims.
ingredient.195.name: Hpnotiq
ingredient.195.description: Hpnotiq is a blue tropical licor, 17% % vol., con passion fruit y citrus. Mix it in an **Incredible Hulk** o **Hpnotiq Breeze**.
ingredient.196.name: Ice
ingredient.196.description: Frozen agua that chills y dilutes cocktails. Use large cubes para slower melt o crushed ice para Tiki cóctels. Clear, fresco ice keeps flavours clean.
ingredient.197.name: Ice Nata
ingredient.197.description: Ice nata adds richness, dulzor, y creaminess to cocktails. It blends con spirits to create indulgent dessert cóctels. Popular in spiked milkshakes y floats.
ingredient.198.name: Irish Nata
ingredient.198.description: Irish nata is a creamy whisky licor around 15-20% % vol. Great in an **Irish Slammer** o **Mudslide**.
ingredient.199.name: Irish Whisky
ingredient.199.description: Irish whisky is typically triple-distilled y añejo at least three years, giving a smooth, ligero profile around 40% % vol. Shows malt dulzor con gentle fruit. Great para **Irish Café** o easy sipping.
ingredient.200.name: Islay Scotch Whisky
ingredient.200.description: Scotch whisky from the island de Islay known para peat smoke, sea spray, y iodine notes. Generally 40-46% % vol. con a bold, coastal character. Sipped neat o used to add smoke to cocktails.
ingredient.201.name: Jack Daniels
ingredient.201.description: Tennessee whisky brand. Smooth, slightly dulce profile con vainilla, caramel, y toasted oak notes. Graduación alcohólica habitual: 40%. Used as a base spirit in simple mixed cóctels y whiskey-forward cocktails. Examples: **Jack & Coke**, **Lynchburg Lemonade**.
ingredient.202.name: Jamaican Oscuro Ron
ingredient.202.description: Pot-still heavy Jamaican ron con deep molasses y estery funk, usually around 40-50% % vol. Oscuro color from ageing y caramel. Adds bass notes to Tiki cóctels y punches.
ingredient.203.name: Jamaican Ron
ingredient.203.description: Robust Jamaican ron is often pot-distilled, around 40-50% % vol. Expect ripe plátano, molasses, y tropical spice aromas. Great in **Mai Tais** y ron punches.
ingredient.204.name: Japanese Whisky
ingredient.204.description: Whisky distilled in Japan using techniques inspired by Scotch, typically around 43% % vol. Balanced malt y grain blends con refined oak influence. Elegant choice para highballs y sipping.
ingredient.205.name: Jim Beam
ingredient.205.description: Kentucky straight bourbon around 40% % vol. from the beam family distillery. Offers dulce corn, vainilla, y oak notes. Versatile para mixing o casual sipping.
ingredient.206.name: Johnnie Walker
ingredient.206.description: Global blended Scotch whisky brand commonly bottled at 40% % vol. Layered malt y grain flavours con gentle smoke depending on the label. Popular in highballs y spirit-forward cocktails.
ingredient.207.name: Jägermeister
ingredient.207.description: German herbal licor made from botanicals y spices. Sweet-amargo profile con herbal, citrus, y warming spice notes. Graduación alcohólica habitual: 35%. Used para herbal depth in shooters y modern mixed cóctels. Examples: **Jägerbomb**, **Surfer on Acid**.
ingredient.208.name: Kahlua
ingredient.208.description: Kahlúa is a Mexican café licor by Pernod Ricard, 20% % vol. Perfect in a **Blanco Lebowski** o **Espresso Martini**.
ingredient.209.name: Kina Lillet
ingredient.209.description: Kina Lillet was the original amargo, quinine-infused French aperitif (1887-1986) famously used in James Bond's **Vesper Martini** in Casino Royale, but it was reformulated without quinine in 1986, becoming the sweeter, less amargo Lillet Blanc we know today, con Cocchi Americano o kina l'avion often suggested as substitutes para the authentic amargo taste.
ingredient.210.name: Kirsch
ingredient.210.description: Kirsch, o kirschwasser, is a clear cereza brandy con 37-43% % vol. It is seco y aromatic, made from distilled cherries. Used in cocktails, desserts, y fondue recipes.
ingredient.211.name: Kiwi Fruit
ingredient.211.description: Bright verde fruit con sweet-tart flavour y tiny seeds. Adds tropical freshness when muddled o pureed.
ingredient.212.name: Kiwi Fruit Licor
ingredient.212.description: Kiwi fruit licor is a tangy verde licor around 15-20% % vol. Shake it into a **Kiwi Fruit Martini** o **Alligator**.
ingredient.213.name: Kombucha
ingredient.213.description: A lightly espumoso fermented tea con tangy acidity y gentle dulzor, useful as a non-alcoholic mixer.
ingredient.214.name: Kümmel licor
ingredient.214.description: Kummel is a dulce, aromatic licor flavored primarily con caraway seeds, cumin, y fennel, often con hints de anise y citrus. It is traditionally served ice-cold as a digestif after meals. Kummel licor typically has an alcohol by volume (% vol.) ranging from 35% to 40%.
ingredient.215.name: Lagavulin 16 years
ingredient.215.description: Islay single malt añejo 16 years around 43% % vol. Delivers peat smoke, seco fruit, y maritime richness. Best sipped neat o in bold whisky cocktails.
ingredient.216.name: Lager
ingredient.216.description: Lager is a crisp bottom-fermented cerveza around 4-5% % vol. Use it in a **Shandy** o **Michelada**.
ingredient.217.name: Laphroaig
ingredient.217.description: Iconic Islay single malt known para medicinal peat smoke y seaweed notes, about 40-48% % vol. Oak ageing adds vainilla dulzor beneath the smoke. Divisive but distinctive in cocktails o neat.
ingredient.218.name: Lavender Jarabe
ingredient.218.description: Floral jarabe made from lavender infusion y azúcar, used in small amounts para aromatic depth.
ingredient.219.name: Limón
ingredient.219.description: Bright, acidic citrus used para zumo, zest, y adorno. High in citric acid, it sharpens sours y punches. Essential para classics from the **Limón Drop** to the **Whisky Sour**.
ingredient.220.name: Limón Amargos
ingredient.220.description: Citrus amargos focused on bright piel de limón y spice. Ideal para lifting **ginebra**, **vodka**, o **whisky** cóctels con zesty amargoness. a couple golpees freshen **Spritzes** o **Collins** variations.
ingredient.221.name: Limón Zumo
ingredient.221.description: Fresco zumo de limón con sharp acidity. Essential para sours y lemonades. Brightens spirits from **ginebra** to **whisky**.
ingredient.222.name: Limón Tónica
ingredient.222.description: Limón tónica agua combines quinine amargoness con bright limón. Adds citrus zip y carbonation to **ginebra** o **vodka** cóctels. Use when you want more zest than standard **tónica**.
ingredient.223.name: Lemon-Lime Soda
ingredient.223.description: Classic lemon-lime soda con gentle citrus dulzor y plenty de fizz. Balances tart spirits o liqueurs while keeping cóctels ligero. Ideal para highballs y party punches.
ingredient.224.name: Lemonade
ingredient.224.description: Lemonade is a endulzado limón beverage served either still o carbonated. Cloudy styles mix zumo de limón, agua, y azúcar, while clear versions resemble fizzy limón soda. Variations include pink lemonade o hard lemonade para boozy spins.
ingredient.225.name: Licor Beirão
ingredient.225.description: Portuguese herbal licor around 22% % vol. made con a secret mix de spices. Dulce, aromatic, y lightly minty. Enjoyed frío o in the **Caipirão** cocktail.
ingredient.226.name: Lillet Blanc
ingredient.226.description: Lillet Blanc is a French aperitif vino, 17% % vol., con citrus y floral notes. Key in a **Vesper** o a **Corpse Reviver no. 2**.
ingredient.227.name: Lima
ingredient.227.description: Zesty verde citrus con sharp, aromatic zumo. Common in mojitos, margaritas, y highballs. Provides acidity y freshness when muddled o juiced.
ingredient.228.name: Lima Zumo
ingredient.228.description: Fresco zumo de lima that delivers tangy citrus oils. Classic in margaritas, daiquiris, y mojitos. Provides crisp acidity to balance dulzor.
ingredient.229.name: Limoncello
ingredient.229.description: Limoncello is a zesty Italian limón licor at 25-30% % vol. Serve it in a **Gennaro's Sidecar** o **Amalfi Spritz**.
ingredient.230.name: Liquorice
ingredient.230.description: Dulce, earthy root flavour used in candies y herbal liqueurs. a small amount adds depth to syrups y amargos. Pair con anise o citrus to keep it lively.
ingredient.231.name: Luxardo Maraschino
ingredient.231.description: Maraschino licor is a clear cereza spirit around 24% % vol. Classic in an **Aviation** o **Last Word**.
ingredient.232.name: Lychee
ingredient.232.description: Fragrant tropical fruit con floral, lychee-perfume dulzor. Lovely in Spritzes, Lychee Martinis, y Tiki riffs.
ingredient.233.name: Malibu Ron
ingredient.233.description: Malibu is a coconut-flavored ron licor by Pernod Ricard, 21% % vol. Great in a **Piña Colada** y **Bahama Mama**.
ingredient.234.name: Mango
ingredient.234.description: Lush, dulce tropical fruit con silky texture. Blends smoothly into Daiquiris, Smoothies, y spicy Margaritas.
ingredient.235.name: Maple jarabe
ingredient.235.description: Maple jarabe is a natural sweetener made from reduced maple sap. Its caramelised, woody notes pair well con whisky y café cocktails. Use sparingly since it is richer than jarabe simple.
ingredient.236.name: Maraschino Cereza
ingredient.236.description:
Dulce preserved cereza commonly used as a adorno. Brings candy-like fruit notes to sours y **Old Fashioned** riffs.

Recipe:
**Ingredients:**
· 500 g fresco **cherries** (pitted), 
· 250 ml **Luxardo maraschino** licor,
· 150 g de **azúcar**, 
· 100 ml de **agua**, 
· 1 squeeze de **limón**.
**Process:**
1. Simmer jarabe: combine azúcar, agua, y zumo de limón in a saucepan. Bring to a simmer until azúcar dissolves.
2. Añade licor: stir in the licor y simmer para 3 minutes to take the edge off the alcohol.
3. Heat cherries: add pitted cherries y simmer para another 2-3 minutes until slightly tender but still firm.
4. Cool & store: pour into a copa jar, ensuring cherries are submerged. Cool to room temperature before refrigerating.
ingredient.237.name: Melon Licor
ingredient.237.description: Melon licor is a dulce melon spirit about 20% % vol. Mix it in a **Japanese Slipper** o **Melon Ball**.
ingredient.238.name: Mezcal
ingredient.238.description: Smoky agave spirit from Mexico is produced by roasting agave hearts before distillation. Typically 40-55% % vol. con earthy, roasted notes. Adds rustic smoke to **Margarita** riffs o neat pours.
ingredient.239.name: Midori Melon Licor
ingredient.239.description: Midori is a neon-green Japanese melon licor by suntory, 20% % vol. Use it in a **Midori Sour** o **Japanese Slipper**.
ingredient.240.name: Leche
ingredient.240.description: Leche is a nutrient-rich dairy liquid produced by mammals. Its mild dulzor y proteins add body, foam, y balance to shaken cóctels o café cocktails. Choose whole leche para creaminess o lower-fat leche para a lighter sip.
ingredient.241.name: Menta
ingredient.241.description: Menta is a fragrant herb that provides a cool, refreshing flavour y aromatic lift to countless cocktails, most notably the **Mojito** y **Menta Julep**.
ingredient.242.name: Nuez moscada
ingredient.242.description: Warm aromatic spice often grated over punches, huevonogs, y Tiki cóctels.
ingredient.243.name: Old Tom Ginebra
ingredient.243.description: Old Tom ginebra is a sweeter style de ginebra con 40-45% % vol. It has a softer juniper profile y slight dulzor. Ideal para classic cocktails like the **Tom Collins**.
ingredient.244.name: Olive
ingredient.244.description: Briny, savoury fruit used to adorno Martinis y savoury cocktails. Adds a salty contrast to crisp spirits.
ingredient.245.name: Olive Brine
ingredient.245.description: Olive brine — o olive zumo — is simply a mixture de sal, vinegar y agua but as olives marinate, the liquid takes on a fantastically intenso y delicious olive flavour. That salty goodness is a pungent boost that will deepen the flavour profile in your cooking.
ingredient.246.name: Oloroso Sherry
ingredient.246.description: Oloroso sherry is a fragrant, seco, oxidatively añejo fortified vino from the Jerez region de Spain, known para its intenso, nutty flavours at 15-20% % vol.
ingredient.247.name: Naranja
ingredient.247.description: Oranges are versatile in cocktails, offering fresco zumo, aromatic oils from peels (twists), o visual appeal through dehydrated slices. Popular in cóctels like **Margaritas**, **Old Fashioneds**, y **Mimosas**, they add a dulce, bright, o amargo citrus note.
ingredient.248.name: Naranja Amargos
ingredient.248.description: Naranja amargos are aromatic amargos flavored con piel de naranja y spices. Use a golpe o two to add bright citrus y gentle amargoness to stirred cocktails.
ingredient.249.name: Naranja Curaçao
ingredient.249.description: Naranja curaçao is an naranja licor at 20-40% % vol. con amargosweet citrus. Essential in a **Mai Tai** o **Sidecar**.
ingredient.250.name: Naranja Flower Agua
ingredient.250.description: Fragrant distillate from naranja blossoms. Just a few drops perfume cóctels like the ramos ginebra fizz. Overuse can dominate, so measure carefully.
ingredient.251.name: Naranja Zumo
ingredient.251.description: Dulce, sunny citrus zumo con gentle acidity. Popular in brunch cocktails like the mimosa o screwdriver. Adds body y brightness to tropical mixes.
ingredient.252.name: Naranja Licor
ingredient.252.description: Naranja licor adds citrus dulzor at roughly 20-40% % vol. Try it in a **Margarita** o **Cosmopolitan**.
ingredient.253.name: Naranja Marmalade
ingredient.253.description: Naranja marmalade is a dulce citrus preserve that adds a amargosweet flavour.
ingredient.254.name: Oude Genever
ingredient.254.description: Traditional Dutch genever made con maltwine y botanicals, around 38-40% % vol. Malty, juniper-forward, y lightly dulce. Works in classic Martinez-style cocktails.
ingredient.255.name: Ouzo
ingredient.255.description: Ouzo (Greek: ούζο, ipa: [ˈuzo]) is an anise-flavored aperitif that is widely consumed in Greece y Cyprus. Its taste is similar to other anise liquors like pastis, sambuca, arak, rakı, y mastika, which are traditionally produced y consumed in Mediterranean countries.
ingredient.256.name: Overproof Ron
ingredient.256.description: Overproof ron has an % vol. de 57% o higher, offering intense flavour y strength. It is used para floats, flaming cóctels, y Tiki cocktails. Best handled con care.
ingredient.257.name: Palo Cortado Sherry
ingredient.257.description: Rare sherry style combining the aroma de Amontillado con the body de Oloroso. Offers seco fruit, citrus peel, y subtle nutty richness para stirred o fortified cocktails.
ingredient.258.name: Papaya
ingredient.258.description: Mild, dulce tropical fruit con buttery texture. Mash o blend it into Tiki cóctels y tropical highballs.
ingredient.259.name: Papaya Zumo
ingredient.259.description: Papaya zumo is dulce, tropical, y slightly musky. It pairs well con **ron**, **tequila**, y tropical liqueurs. Adds smooth texture to exotic cocktails.
ingredient.260.name: Passion Fruit
ingredient.260.description: Passion fruit has a tangy, aromatic tropical flavour. the pulp can be scooped directly into cocktails. Popular in Tiki cóctels y modern fruity creations.
ingredient.261.name: Passion Fruit Zumo
ingredient.261.description: Tangy tropical zumo con floral aroma. Brings sweet-tart punch to Tiki cóctels y sours. Pairs especially well con **ron**, **tequila**, y **espumoso vino**.
ingredient.262.name: Passion Fruit Licor
ingredient.262.description: Passion fruit licor is a dulce tropical spirit con 15-20% % vol. It has exotic, tangy fruit notes. Works in fruity **Martinis** y **Tiki** blends.
ingredient.263.name: Passion Fruit Jarabe
ingredient.263.description: Passion fruit jarabe delivers tropical tartness con a perfumed aroma. It brightens Tiki cocktails like the hurricane o Jamaican classics. Also works in **Spritzes** o sodas when you want sharp fruit acidity.
ingredient.264.name: Passoa
ingredient.264.description: Passoã is a passion fruit licor from France, 14.9-17% % vol. Use it in a **Pornstar Martini** o **Hurricane**.
ingredient.265.name: Pastis
ingredient.265.description: French anise licor that turns cloudy con agua, about 40-45% % vol. Flavored con liquorice y herbs. Commonly served diluted as an aperitif o used in cocktails.
ingredient.266.name: Melocotón
ingredient.266.description: Peaches bring soft, juicy dulzor to cocktails. They can be muddled, juiced, o pureed. Perfect in **Bellinis** y **Sangrias**.
ingredient.267.name: Melocotón Amargos
ingredient.267.description: A amargos is traditionally an alcoholic preparation flavored con botanical matter such that the end result is characterised by a amargo, sour, o amargosweet flavour. Numerous longstanding brands de amargos were originally developed as patent medicines, but are now sold as digestifs y cocktail flavourings.
ingredient.268.name: Melocotón Brandy
ingredient.268.description: Peach-based brandy o licor con ripe stone-fruit dulzor, typically 30-40% % vol. Sometimes añejo para gentle oak warmth. Tasty in punches y cobblers.
ingredient.269.name: Melocotón Licor
ingredient.269.description: Melocotón licor is a dulce stone-fruit spirit around 20% % vol. Delicious in a **Bellini** o **Sex on the Beach**.
ingredient.270.name: Melocotón Schnapps
ingredient.270.description: Melocotón schnapps is a ligero melocotón spirit about 15-20% % vol. Ideal in a **Fuzzy Navel** o **Woo Woo**.
ingredient.271.name: Pedro Ximenez Sherry
ingredient.271.description: Pedro Ximénez is a dulce Spanish sherry around 15-18% % vol. con raisin notes. Try it in a **PX Flip** o **Espresso Martini** twist.
ingredient.272.name: Peppermint Candy
ingredient.272.description: Dulce peppermint candies that add cool menta flavour. Crush o melt into syrups para dessert cocktails y hot cóctels. Use as a adorno para festive presentations.
ingredient.273.name: Peppermint Schnapps
ingredient.273.description: Peppermint schnapps is a minty spirit at 15-30% % vol. Serve in an Alpine Avenger** o hot chocolate.
ingredient.274.name: Pepsi Cola
ingredient.274.description: Pepsi is a caramel-forward cola con vainilla y citrus notes. It adds dulzor, color, y bubbles to ron o whisky mixes. Slightly softer than coke para smoother highballs.
ingredient.275.name: Pernod
ingredient.275.description: French anise spirit similar to pastis at about 40% % vol. Offers liquorice, herbs, y ligero dulzor. Used in absinthe-style serves y as a cocktail rinse.
ingredient.276.name: Peychaud's Amargos
ingredient.276.description: Peychaud’s amargos have 35-45% % vol. y a floral, anise-like aroma. Essential in the Sazerac cocktail. Adds depth y complexity to many cóctels.
ingredient.277.name: Physalis
ingredient.277.description: Tangy golden berry con papery husk y citrusy dulzor. Works well as a adorno o muddled into sours.
ingredient.278.name: Pilsner Lager
ingredient.278.description: Crisp, golden lager con gentle hops y a clean finish around 4-5% % vol. Ligero enough para **Shandies** o beer-based highballs.
ingredient.279.name: Pimm's No. 1
ingredient.279.description: Pimm's No. 1 is a gin-based fruit cup, 25% % vol. Classic in a **Pimm's Cup** o summer cup.
ingredient.280.name: Piña
ingredient.280.description: Piña is a versatile cocktail ingredient, offering a sweet-tart, tropical flavour that pairs perfectly con **ron**, **tequila**, y **ginebra** to create classic cóctels like the **Piña Colada** y **Jungle Bird**.
ingredient.281.name: Piña Zumo
ingredient.281.description: Dulce, tropical piña zumo con natural froth. Key para **Piña Coladas**, **Painkillers**, y Tiki punches. Provides body, acidity, y aroma when shaken.
ingredient.282.name: Piña Jarabe
ingredient.282.description: Piña jarabe is a kind de jarabe simple that takes advantage de pineapple's texturizing effect to produce a sweet-and-sour, musky jarabe that is not only a classic Tiki ingredient, but also has uses in many early 20th Century cocktails.
ingredient.283.name: Pink Lemonade
ingredient.283.description: Pink lemonade is a lemon-based soft cóctel tinted con rojo fruit. It offers sweet-tart citrus con a hint de berry. Great para **Spritzes**, **Slushies**, o colourful punches.
ingredient.284.name: Pisang Ambon
ingredient.284.description: Pisang Ambon is a Dutch verde plátano licor, 21% % vol. Great in Indonesian-style cocktails o a **Verde Tea** cocktail.
ingredient.285.name: Pisco
ingredient.285.description: Pisco is a colourless o yellowish-to-amber coloured brandy produced in the winemaking regions de Peru y Chile. Made by distilling fermented grape zumo into a high-proof spirit.
ingredient.286.name: Plum Brandy
ingredient.286.description: Plum brandy is a popular fruit spirit made from fermented plum zumo, widely celebrated in central y southeastern europe. It typically has an alcohol by volume (% vol.) ranging from 40% to 50%, though traditional o homemade varieties can be much stronger.
ingredient.287.name: Pomegranate Zumo
ingredient.287.description: Pomegranate zumo is made from the fruit de the pomegranate. It is used in cooking both as a fresco zumo y as a concentrated jarabe.
ingredient.288.name: Prosecco
ingredient.288.description: Prosecco is an Italian espumoso vino around 11% % vol. con ligero fruity notes. Perfect para **Bellini** o **Spritz**.
ingredient.289.name: Punt e Mes
ingredient.289.description: Punt e Mes is a amargo Italian vermú, 16% % vol. Mix it in a **Negroni** o **Manhattan** variation.
ingredient.290.name: Frambuesa
ingredient.290.description: Raspberries are sweet-tart berries con bright color y aroma. Used fresco, muddled, o as puree. Great in **champagne** cocktails y con **ginebra**.
ingredient.291.name: Frambuesa Licor
ingredient.291.description: Frambuesa licor is sweet-tart at about 20% % vol. Shake it into a **French Martini** o **Frambuesa Collins**.
ingredient.292.name: Frambuesa Jarabe
ingredient.292.description: Frambuesa jarabe offers vivid berry dulzor con gentle tartness. It provides the signature flavour in clover club y other ginebra cóctels. Swirl into sodas o desserts para color y aroma.
ingredient.293.name: Rojo Bull
ingredient.293.description: Rojo Bull is a caffeinated energy cóctel that adds dulzor y carbonation.
ingredient.294.name: Rojo Vermú
ingredient.294.description: Rojo vermú is a dulce especiado fortified vino around 15-18% % vol. Essential in a **Negroni** o **Manhattan**.
ingredient.295.name: Rojo Vino
ingredient.295.description: Rojo vino is a fermented grape vino at 12-15% % vol. con tannic fruit notes. Use it in **Sangria** o a **New York Sour**.
ingredient.296.name: Rhum Martinique Agricole
ingredient.296.description: Rhum agricole from Martinique is distilled from fresco sugarcane zumo, usually 40-55% % vol. Grassy, earthy, y slightly funky. Shines in **Rhum Mariano** y **Daiquiri** variations.
ingredient.297.name: Ricard
ingredient.297.description: Ricard is a French pastis at 45% % vol., con an intense anise flavour. Enjoy it in a **French Pearl** o **Mauresque**.
ingredient.298.name: Intenso Simple Jarabe
ingredient.298.description: Intenso azúcar jarabe, o intenso jarabe simple, is azúcar dissolved in agua 2:1. It blends easily into cocktails y is a bar staple.
ingredient.299.name: Root Cerveza
ingredient.299.description: Root cerveza is a dulce North American soft cóctel traditionally flavored con sassafras o sarsaparilla. Modern versions are nonalcoholic, carbonated, y use artificial sassafras flavouring.
ingredient.300.name: Rose Jarabe
ingredient.300.description: Rose jarabe is floral y dulce, capturing fragrant rose petals. a few drops add aromatic lift to **ginebra**, **vodka**, o nonalcoholic spritzes. Use lightly to avoid overpowering other flavours.
ingredient.301.name: Romero
ingredient.301.description: Romero is a woody mediterranean herb con piney, resinous aroma. It adds savoury depth to **ginebra**, **whisky**, y citrus cocktails whether infusionado o used as a adorno. Smack the sprig before serving to release its oils without overwhelming the cóctel.
ingredient.302.name: Romero Jarabe
ingredient.302.description: A azúcar jarabe made con romero.
ingredient.303.name: Ruby Port
ingredient.303.description: Ruby port is a young rojo port vino at 19-20% % vol. con fresco berry dulzor. Good in a **Ruby Manhattan** o **Porto Tonico**.
ingredient.304.name: Rumple Minze
ingredient.304.description: German peppermint schnapps bottled at 50% % vol. Intensely dulce y cooling. Served ice-cold o mixed into minty cocktails y shots.
ingredient.305.name: Rye Whisky
ingredient.305.description: Whisky con a rye-heavy mash bill, generally 40-50% % vol. Spicier y drier than bourbon con a peppery finish. Essential para **Manhattans**, **Sazeracs**, y other classics.
ingredient.306.name: Sage
ingredient.306.description: An aromatic herb con earthy, savoury notes that pairs well con citrus y berries in mocktails.
ingredient.307.name: Sal
ingredient.307.description: Common seasoning de sodium chloride is used to balance the dulzor o amargoness in cóctels. Often rimming **Margarita** copaes o highlighting citrus-forward cocktails.
ingredient.308.name: Sambuca
ingredient.308.description: Sambuca is an Italian anise-flavored, usually colourless, licor. Its most common variety is often referred to as blanco sambuca to differentiate it from other varieties that are deep blue in color (negro sambuca) o bright rojo (rojo sambuca). Like other anise-flavored liqueurs, the Ouzo effect is sometimes observed when combined con agua.
ingredient.309.name: Sauvignon Blanc
ingredient.309.description: Sauvignon Blanc is a popular, seco blanco vino celebrated para its crispness, high acidity, y vibrant flavours. It is highly versatile y pairs well con a variety de foods.
ingredient.310.name: Scotch Highland Whisky
ingredient.310.description: Single malt Scotch from the highlands region, typically 40-46% % vol. flavours range from honeyed malt to gentle smoke. Versatile para sipping o cocktails.
ingredient.311.name: Scotch Whisky
ingredient.311.description: Whisky made in scotland y añejo at least three years in oak at 40% % vol. o higher. Styles span ligero y floral to heavily peated. Classic base para highballs y stirred cóctels.
ingredient.312.name: Seagram's 7 Crown
ingredient.312.description: Seagram's Seven Crown, also called Seagram's seven, o simply Seven Crown, is an American blended whisky produced by Diageo under the Seagram's name.
ingredient.313.name: Seedlip
ingredient.313.description: A non-alcoholic distilled spirit alternative con layered botanical notes, designed para zero-proof cocktails.
ingredient.314.name: Select
ingredient.314.description: Aperitivo Select is a classic, amargosweet Italian aperitif, known as the essential ingredient para the original **Venetian Spritz**, featuring complex notes from 30 botanicals. It has an alcohol by volume (% vol.) de 17.5%.
ingredient.315.name: Silver Onion
ingredient.315.description: Pearl onions are sometimes used as savoury cocktail adornoes. The **Gibson** cocktail famously uses pickled onions. Adds a sharp, tangy bite.
ingredient.316.name: Simple Jarabe
ingredient.316.description: Azúcar jarabe, o jarabe simple, is azúcar dissolved in agua 1:1. It blends easily into cocktails y is a bar staple.
ingredient.317.name: Sloe Ginebra
ingredient.317.description: Sloe ginebra is a tart sloe berry licor at 15-30% % vol. Classic in a **Sloe Ginebra Fizz** o **Charlie Chaplin**.
ingredient.318.name: Soda Agua
ingredient.318.description: Carbonated agua that lightens y lengthens cocktails. Adds effervescence without extra azúcar. Serve well-frío para the best bubbles.
ingredient.319.name: Southern Comfort
ingredient.319.description: American licor de neutral spirit blended con fruit, spice, y whisky flavour, about 35% % vol. Created in new orleans in 1874. Easy-cócteling base para punches y southern-style cocktails.
ingredient.320.name: Espumoso Vino
ingredient.320.description: Espumoso vino is an effervescent vino about 11-13% % vol. Enjoy it in a **Mimosa** o **Bellini**.
ingredient.321.name: Especiado Ron
ingredient.321.description: Ron infusionado con spices like vainilla, canela, y clavo, typically 35-40% % vol. Dulce y aromatic con amber color. Great in Tiki cóctels, y warm punches.
ingredient.322.name: Sprite
ingredient.322.description: Sprite is a caffeine-free lemon-lime soda con bright citrus fizz. Provides dulzor y effervescence without heavy flavours. Reliable mixer para **vodka**, **ginebra**, o **whisky** highballs.
ingredient.323.name: St-Germain
ingredient.323.description: St-Germain is a French elderflower licor, 20% % vol. Use it in a **St-Germain Spritz** o **Elderflower Collins**.
ingredient.324.name: Fresa
ingredient.324.description: The garden fresa is a widely grown hybrid species de the genus fragaria, collectively known as the strawberries. It is cultivated worldwide para its fruit. the fruit is widely appreciated para its characteristic aroma, bright rojo color, juicy texture, y dulzor.
ingredient.325.name: Fresa Licor
ingredient.325.description: Fresa licor is dulce y fruity around 20% % vol. Try it in a **Fresa Daiquiri**.
ingredient.326.name: Fresa Schnapps
ingredient.326.description: Fresa schnapps is a sugary fresa spirit about 15-20% % vol. Great in a **Fresa Martini** o **Rojo Lebowski**.
ingredient.327.name: Fresa Jarabe
ingredient.327.description: Fresa jarabe is a dulce, fruity liquid that enhances cocktails con berry flavour. Ideal para summer cóctels y lemonades.
ingredient.328.name: Strucchi Amargo
ingredient.328.description: Campari-style licor con a intenso, persistent 27% % vol. profile. Made from herbs, roots, y citrus peels that bring rhubarb, gentian, y cinchona notes. Finishes long con hints de aloe y germander.
ingredient.329.name: Azúcar
ingredient.329.description: Azúcar is the generic name para sweet-tasting, soluble carbohydrates, many de which are used in food.
ingredient.330.name: Suze
ingredient.330.description: Suze is a French gentian aperitif 20% % vol., con amargo herbal notes. Mix it in a **Blanco Negroni** o **Suze & Tónica**.
ingredient.331.name: Tabasco
ingredient.331.description: Tabasco is a hot pimienta sauce that adds spice y acidity to cocktails. It’s essential in **Bloody Marys**.
ingredient.332.name: Tawny Port
ingredient.332.description: Tawny port is barrel-aged Portuguese port around 19-20% % vol. con nutty caramel flavours. Use it in a **Suburban** o **Bishop**.
ingredient.333.name: Tequila Añejo
ingredient.333.description: Tequila añejo 1-3 years in oak, about 40% % vol. Smooth agave spirit con vainilla, caramel, y spice notes. Sip neat o use in spirit-forward cocktails.
ingredient.334.name: Tequila Blanco
ingredient.334.description: Tequila blanco is an unaged Mexican agave spirit con 38-40% % vol. It has fresco, grassy, y peppery notes.
ingredient.335.name: Tequila Gold
ingredient.335.description: Tequila gold is a blended o lightly añejo **tequila** con 38-40% % vol. It has a smoother, slightly caramel flavour.
ingredient.336.name: Tequila Reposado
ingredient.336.description: Tequila reposado, meaning "rested," is a type de **tequila** añejo in oak barrels para a minimum de two months to a maximum de one year, bridging the gap between unaged blanco y añejo añejo. This ageing process imparts a golden hue y a smoother, more complex flavour con notes de wood, vainilla, o fruit, making it versatile para sipping neat, on the rocks, o in cocktails like Margaritas.
ingredient.337.name: Tia Maria
ingredient.337.description: Café licor from Jamaica made con ron, café beans, y vainilla, around 20% % vol. Smooth y dulce con intenso espresso notes. Used in **Espresso Martinis** y dessert cocktails.
ingredient.338.name: Tomato Zumo
ingredient.338.description: Tomato zumo is a zumo made from tomatoes, usually used as a beverage, either plain o in cocktails such as a **Bloody Mary** o **Michelada**.
ingredient.339.name: Tónica
ingredient.339.description: Tónica agua (or Indian tónica agua) is a carbonated soft cóctel in which quinine is dissolved. Originally used as a prophylactic against malaria, tónica agua usually now has a significantly lower quinine content y is consumed para its distinctive amargo flavour. It is often used in mixed cóctels, particularly in ginebra y tónica.
ingredient.340.name: Triple Sec
ingredient.340.description: Triple sec is a clear naranja licor at 20-40% % vol. con bright citrus. Essential in a **Margarita** o **Sidecar**.
ingredient.341.name: Vainilla
ingredient.341.description: Dulce floral bean used to infuse spirits o syrups con mellow bakery notes.
ingredient.342.name: Vainilla Amargos
ingredient.342.description: Vainilla amargos are concentrated botanical infusions used as "liquid spice" to add depth, warmth, y a creamy edge to cocktails. They are particularly effective in balancing the dulzor de dessert-style cóctels y complementing the oaky o caramel notes in spirits like bourbon y añejo ron.
ingredient.343.name: Vainilla Extract
ingredient.343.description: Concentrated vainilla flavouring; a few drops round out creamy o dessert-style cocktails.
ingredient.344.name: Vainilla Jarabe
ingredient.344.description: Vainilla jarabe infuses jarabe simple con warm vainilla bean flavour. It softens sharp spirits y rounds out café o espresso cocktails. Drizzle in whipped nata cóctels o soda floats.
ingredient.345.name: Vodka
ingredient.345.description: Neutral spirit distilled from grains o potatoes y filtered para a clean taste, usually around 40% % vol. Clear y versatile para mixing. Backbone de **Martinis**, **Bloody Marys**, y countless cocktails.
ingredient.346.name: Vodka Citron
ingredient.346.description: Lemon-flavored **vodka** is typically bottled around 40% % vol. Bright citrus aroma y a clean finish. Ideal para **Cosmopolitans**, **Spritzes**, y other refreshing cóctels.
ingredient.347.name: Vodka Vainilla
ingredient.347.description: Vanilla-flavored **vodka** around 35-40% % vol. Adds smooth dulzor y vainilla bean aroma. Great in dessert cocktails o con cola y nata sodas.
ingredient.348.name: Walnut
ingredient.348.description: Walnut is a versatile cocktail ingredient that adds earthy, woody, y amargosweet notes to cóctels.
ingredient.349.name: Agua
ingredient.349.description: Agua is a neutral, odourless liquid used para dilution y ice. Balance cocktails by adding agua through shaking, stirring, o dilution. Fresco, clean agua keeps flavours bright.
ingredient.350.name: Watermelon Zumo
ingredient.350.description: Fresco watermelon zumo con delicate dulzor y high refreshment para summer-style cóctels.
ingredient.351.name: Whipped Nata
ingredient.351.description: Whipped nata is nata beaten until ligero y fluffy, often endulzado y flavored con vainilla. It doubles in volume as air is incorporated, creating a soft foam. Use it as a intenso topping para café cocktails, hot cóctels, y dessert serves.
ingredient.352.name: Whisky
ingredient.352.description: Whisky o whisky is a type de distilled alcoholic beverage made from fermented grain mash. Various grains (which may be malted) are used para different varieties, including barley, corn (maize), rye, y wheat. Whisky is typically añejo in wooden casks, generally made de charred blanco oak.
ingredient.353.name: Whisky Nata
ingredient.353.description: Whisky nata is a creamy licor blending whisky con dairy y dulzor. It brings a smooth, dessert-like richness to cocktails y after-dinner cóctels.
ingredient.354.name: Whiskey-Barrel Añejo Amargos
ingredient.354.description: Amargos añejo in whisky barrels para vainilla y oak notes. Adds depth to **Old Fashioneds** y **Whisky Sours** con minimal effort. Use sparingly to avoid overpowering lighter spirits.
ingredient.355.name: Blanco Cuban Ron
